description: Variation of condition U0065706 (Approved plans) of planning permisison 19/1054/VRC to allow for the following (1) Removal of two rooflights on rear elevation; (2) Increasing the separation between the two rooflights on front elevation; (3) Addition of two obscured roof lights in bedroom (one on East and one on West); (4) Addition of two clear roof lights over stairs (one on East and one on West); (5) Change of roof pitch to flat roof.Variation of condition U57966 (Approved plans) of planning permission 15/3518/FUL to allow the following: Removal of basements, removal of two rooflights on front elevation, ground floor side and rear extension, first floor rear extension, addition of two rooflights on rear elevation, removal of one rooflight on east and west side elevations, removal of ground floor windows on east and west elevations; relocation of bin store and addition of bin store, provision of rear cycle store, rationalisation of windows on side elevations, change of windows on ground floor rear elevation and infill of front porch areas. (Approved under 19/1054/VRC)
